# [Interview #1124: Mysterious Galaxy (Balboa Ave), San Diego, CA, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1124#7)

#### Leinton

Do Gasper ferring and allomancers holding their breath use similar mechanisms to hold their breath?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It's not the same, but it is similar.
